1    | #ifndef __CHECK_SUM_H
2    | #define __CHECK_SUM_H
3    | 
4    | /*
5    |  * Until C compilers support C++ namespaces, we use this
6    |  * prefix for our namespace.
7    |  */
8    | #ifndef NAMESPACE
9    | #define NAMESPACE(x)    _w32_ ## x     
10   | #endif
11   | 
12   | #ifndef BYTE
13   | #define BYTE unsigned char
14   | #endif
15   | 
16   | #ifndef WORD
17   | #define WORD unsigned short
18   | #endif
19   | 
20   | #ifndef DWORD
21   | #define DWORD unsigned long
22   | #endif
23   | 
24   | #define inchksum      NAMESPACE (inchksum)
25   | #define inchksum_fast NAMESPACE (inchksum_fast)
26   | #define do_checksum   NAMESPACE (do_checksum)
27   | 
28   | extern WORD inchksum    (const void *ptr, int len);
29   | extern int  do_checksum (BYTE *buf, int proto, int len);
30   | 
31   | #ifndef cdecl
32   | #define cdecl  /* prevent register calls */
33   | #endif
34   | 
35   | /* chksum0.asm / chksum0.s
36   |  */
37   | extern WORD cdecl inchksum_fast (const void *ptr, int len); 
38   | 
39   | #if defined(USE_FAST_CKSUM)
40   |   #define checksum(p,len) inchksum_fast(p,len)
41   | #else
42   |   #define checksum(p,len) inchksum(p,len)
43   | #endif
44   | 
45   | #endif
